price: Ниједан народ не може ни да убрза ни да успори одређено му време.
arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
